Detailed Description

A common interface for main window component such as dock widget, tool bar and so on.

enum iqtgui::IMainWindowComponent::MainWindowComponentFlags

Flags describing behaviour of the main window component.

Enumerator
WCF_NONE 
WCF_PERMANENT 

Window component is permanent shown and cannot be closed by user.

virtual bool iqtgui::IMainWindowComponent::AddToMainWindow ( QMainWindow &  mainWindow)
pure virtual

Add this component to main window.

Implemented in iqtgui::CToolBarGuiCompBase, iqtgui::CDockWidgetGuiComp, and iqtgui::CStatusBarWidgetComp.

virtual QByteArray iqtgui::IMainWindowComponent::GetAssociatedDocumentTypeId ( ) const
pure virtual

Get the type ID of the associated document.

The main window component will be only shown, if a document with associated type ID is currently active in the application.

Note
This method is only used in the context of document-based applications.

Implemented in iqtgui::CToolBarGuiCompBase, iqtgui::CDockWidgetGuiComp, and iqtgui::CStatusBarWidgetComp.
